content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You have just successfully completed your CA general introduction test!\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please obtain some revision tips below:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can post an entry calculated by a manager if reasonable explanation has been provided to you. Do not escalate the issue to top management unless you are totally confident in the fact that your manager asks you to post an illegal entry. Keep all supporting documentation for each entry.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each entry must be supported by either a supporting document (an invoice, bill, agreement, etc.) or by calculations. During posting any entry both people (a person who parks it and a person who posts it) should double check ALL attributes of the entry.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More details could be obtained in JE policy. Some issues regarding account correspondence are described in ECOR (all 3 files).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each task in SAP FC Checklist should be performed (and submitted) prior to \\\"due date\\\", as well as approved prior to \\\"approval due date\\\". If you are not able to do that - please agree upon your further actions with your immediate manager.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tasks can not be deleted or ignored without any reason or any comment left in it. Approved tasks should contain the final version of related files.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You should park and post entries only within the level of your responsibility (and only those you are very confident about).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Parking, posting and reversal of entries (including mass transactions) are performed through ZEDMS SAP transaction.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A reversal of an entry is performed in case the mistake has been identified or there is a special business process, that implies periodical reversing of entries (for example, accruals).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You should always remember that all up-to-date accounting policies, instructions and guidelines are stored here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCFOOCA/Policies+and+other+documentation+for+Corporate+Accounting\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCFOOCA/Policies+and+other+documentation+for+Corporate+Accounting\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\",\\r\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMFICOCFO/Finance+Documents+Storage\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Finance Documents Storage - EPM-CFOO-Database - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As you may see from the info in this Module, KB page contains a lot of useful and summarized data. So, the more information provided you study now, the faster you become a valuable Global Accounting team member.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please go to Guidelines starting page as it contains more up-to-date info than this Adaptation Module, and double-check if you can find additional info that has not been mentioned within this Adaptation Portal before: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCFOOCA/Guidelines\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCFOOCA/Guidelines\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Congratulations! You have just finished your \\\"Welcome to CA\\\" module! \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
